content.value:
I guess I am glad that you’re not a CEO then and that I don’t work for you.

If you’ve made a mistake so grevious that employees fee the need to publicly shame you into doing the right thing, you’re very likely the problem, not the employees.
content.html: I guess I am glad that you’re not a CEO then and that I don’t work for you. If you’ve made a mistake so grevious that employees fee the need to publicly shame you into doing the right thing, you’re very likely the problem, not the employees.
